itemmodelfix.configuration.title: Item Model Fix Configuration
itemmodelfix.options.generation_type.van:
Performance impact: §b§lnone§r
Uses Vanilla model generation.
itemmodelfix.options.generation_type.unl:
Performance impact: §b§lnone§r
Uses Vanilla model generation,
but applies some math to make it look correct.
Might cause flickering along model edges.
itemmodelfix.options.generation_type.pix:
Performance impact: §a§llow§r-§e§lmedium§r
Generates all pixels individually.
Provides best results but causes a larger impact
with higher resolution resource packs.
itemmodelfix.options.fix_fluid_rendering:
Performance impact: §b§lnone
Fixes edges between fluid texture sides.
